message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer gives us both a good deal.
My turn to propose something fair, Alice. This accounts for the time-value of money.
I understand time is money, Bob, but your last offer was too low. This is my counter-offer.
Let's stop wasting time, Alice. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.
A 50/50 split doesn't reflect the shrinking pot, Bob. This offer is more realistic.
This is getting us nowhere, Alice. I'm compromising. This offer gives you more, but we need to close this deal soon.
You're right Bob, we need to close this.  This offer gives me a slight edge considering the circumstances.
Alice, this is ridiculous. I need to concede to get any deal done. This is my final offer.
